content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.ict_capability
(
Task_ID NVARCHAR(100),
Task_Name NVARCHAR(200),
Buckets NVARCHAR(100),
Progress NVARCHAR(100),
Priority NVARCHAR(100),
Created_By NVARCHAR(100),
Created_Date NVARCHAR(100),
Start_Date NVARCHAR(100),
Due_Date NVARCHAR(100),
Late NVARCHAR(100),
Completed_Date NVARCHAR(100),
Completed_By NVARCHAR(100),
Completed_Checklist_Items NVARCHAR(1000),
Checklist_items NVARCHAR(1000),
Assigned_name NVARCHAR(100),
Labels NVARCHAR(100),
Filename NVARCHAR(100)

)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


drop table dbo.ict_capability
